info.name: Sendly Backend API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Sendly Marketing Backend - SMS marketing platform for Shopify stores

**Architecture:**
- All store-scoped endpoints require `X-Shopify-Shop-Domain` header
- Base URL: https://sendly-marketing-backend.onrender.com
- Standardized response format with `success`, `data`, and `message` fields
- Pagination support for list endpoints
- Rate limiting on campaign operations
